TopicTitle: [0.25] Lionhead Aerospace Inc. - Icarus v0.4 updated

Articles.Content:
I like the design, especially radiation shield used as a heat shield

Before you leave, could you please tell us how big it is and/or how big the crew can be?

Take care!

I'm going to holidays for 2 weeks, so I give you a pic to make waiting easier:

I'm working on a interstellar ship for a long time, and I dig it up last week.

Code name: Icarus.

No more for now ^^.

Wow. I love it!

Edit- Which is the front and which is the back?

Is there a simple way to allow action groups to be utilized with your parachutes? I love the look of them and frequently use them as drogues, but I much prefer action groups to staging for parachute deployment.

I love that LM, but I think the decent stage's color should be a bit more gold in coloring, could just be my broken computer screen though......

Edited April 27, 2013 by Kerbolman

I like the design, especially radiation shield used as a heat shield

Before you leave, could you please tell us how big it is and/or how big the crew can be?

Take care!

How big? How big is the VAB? Touch the sky, touch the ground. I think it's about 30m long. I'm thinking about a 5 members crew.

Wow. I love it!

Edit- Which is the front and which is the back?

The front is one the left. The command pod is the part with the long antennas and engines are behind the heatshield. I'm not satisfied of the command pod so I think I'll remake it.

Is there a simple way to allow action groups to be utilized with your parachutes? I love the look of them and frequently use them as drogues, but I much prefer action groups to staging for parachute deployment.
Can't you add action group in the VAB? If not I'll check that.
I love that LM, but I think the decent stage's color should be a bit more gold in coloring, could just be my broken computer screen though......

I think the textures need to be a little improve before a release.

About the Icarus, it'll be a modular ship so you can make your own design (best may be added as "official" ships). The ship can carry probes and landers.
Have fun during your holidays Yogui. Nice picture, your doing good work as always.

Saw your ship and decided to challenge you:

Can carry in it's current configuration up to 14 kerbals with artificial gravity,about 86% of it is stock so making it stock probably won't be an issue. The only issue is lag since it has many parts so if someone wants to take up this project pm me, my PC can't handle it right now, will get a new one in a month

Icarus is based on the ships from the movie "sunshine" ?

looks awesome either way
My Icarus wasn't based on the movie "Sunshine", I didn't know this movie. I was inspired by Pegasus from the movie "Voyage to the planets".
Will your ship require orbital construction?
It's a early alpha for now but, at the moment it don't need to be build in orbit. It can even take off without help.

Even if I don't like this kind of ship, it's a nice one. But I can't wait for MEM and his Command Module :-D Watched the video again (and your tutorials, I've learn a lot of thing thanks )and it's amazing ^^

Can't you add action group in the VAB? If not I'll check that.

No, I haven't been able to. Clicking on the chute just displays the part name; no actions available.

cheers.

No, I haven't been able to. Clicking on the chute just displays the part name; no actions available.

cheers.

The chute is an old one, I have to update it with the new module. I'll do it next week. If I forgot, remember me.

Nice interstellar ship, I'm looking forward to the MEM update

Yogui87:

StanNL_97 here, my account got messed up because of the forum issues so I made a new and proper account. You can contact me through here again.

I really enjoy the quality of your mods, thank you. Unfortunately, I feel like I am cheating when using them. For instance, the Prometheus rover runs infinitely without the loss of power. I can add resource drain to the cfg but as you know, proper recharging via the solar panels needs to be done on the model level. Any plans to add this functionality?

Nice interstellar ship, I'm looking forward to the MEM update

Yogui87:

StanNL_97 here, my account got messed up because of the forum issues so I made a new and proper account. You can contact me through here again.

Thanks, I recognized your nickname. Be sure you will be one of the first informed when new stuff will be release. I'm a gret fan of your handsome videos.

I really enjoy the quality of your mods, thank you. Unfortunately, I feel like I am cheating when using them. For instance, the Prometheus rover runs infinitely without the loss of power. I can add resource drain to the cfg but as you know, proper recharging via the solar panels needs to be done on the model level. Any plans to add this functionality?

There are clearly released for .18.4, just wait a bit for Yogui to update them. He has a lot of work.

I really enjoy the quality of your mods, thank you. Unfortunately, I feel like I am cheating when using them. For instance, the Prometheus rover runs infinitely without the loss of power. I can add resource drain to the cfg but as you know, proper recharging via the solar panels needs to be done on the model level. Any plans to add this functionality?

The rover is powered by CleverBobcat plugin than can't permiet energy drain. I have to update it with the stock RoverModule, but I'm little short in informations about this module yet.

Don't feel like you're cheating because real rovers don't fall out of energy so easily.

Many of you asked me to update the circular solar panel.

Now it's done: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-2-circular-solar-panel-2/

The solar panels now produce electricity and follow the sun.

Many of you asked me to update the circular solar panel.

Now it's done: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-2-circular-solar-panel-2/

The solar panels now produce electricity and follow the sun.

Thanks a lot

Many of you asked me to update the circular solar panel.

Now it's done: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-2-circular-solar-panel-2/

The solar panels now produce electricity and follow the sun.

Wow, thanks! I've been waiting for these a long time.

I'm going to try and recreate the Constellation program mission

Oh yes!

I now bestow the title "Le Roi Soleil" to Yogui.

Wow, thanks! I've been waiting for these a long time.

I'm going to try and recreate the Constellation program mission

Bobcat is working on the whole Constellation program right now.

Bobcat is working on the whole Constellation program right now.

I was planing making this program one day, Bobcat is faster.
